commit.message:
cse.c (cse_insn): Stores in a libcall sequence can invalidate previous loads.

	* cse.c (cse_insn): Stores in a libcall sequence can invalidate
	previous loads.

From-SVN: r90587

files.patch:

+	previous loads.
